text: Medio Systems is a US company engaged in realtime predictive analysis services and software development. Founded in 2004. Headquartered in Seattle. It has been owned by Nokia since 2014. Medio software is based on the cloud computing framework Apache Hadoop, and analyzes large amounts of data for mobile users. Historical and predictive analysis of pre-existing data is offered. == References == Category:American software companies Category:2004 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Seattle
title: Medio (company)
